intro: Bikkia australis, commonly known as the Australian bikkia, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Cucurbitaceae, which includes cucumbers and gourds. The plant is characterized by its trailing growth habit and distinctive heart-shaped leaves. Its flowers are unisexual, with separate male and female flowers on the same plant. Bikkia australis typically grows in dry, sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments.
